title: Ticket #6090: mutability of StringList breaks history_helper, probably other things
description: LIGO reports crashes in condor_history_helper. Among other problems, this program crashes in the static object destructor for StringList. This is because the next method has been marked const, with the underlying List<char> it uses as mutable. StringList::next is certainly not conceptually const. Compiler optimization of const StringLists are free to elide repeated calls to next, which cause problems with duplicate frees.
